article.title: Springly
article.author: Sam Randels
article.excerpt: Job searching isn't easy, but it doesn't have to be quite so hard. Springly is a tool designed to assist job-seekers in organizing their job search.

authors.bio: Lifelong learner and lover of puzzles big and small.
authors.name: Sam Randels

next.title: CommuteBuddy
next.author: Sam Randels
next.excerpt: Commuting costs more than we realize. CommuteBuddy provides an elegant way to tackle the tough decisions commuters face and save money in the process.

next.title: ShopDesk
next.author: Sam Randels
next.excerpt: ShopDesk is a modern e-commerce platform designed for small business from the ground up.
